mapper.sql: id, menu_id, module_id, module_base_id, show_layout, sort_module, sort_base
mapper.select:
SELECT p.id,p.menu_id,m.title as menu_name,p.module_id,d.module_name,p.sort_module,d.display_num,group_concat(p.module_base_id separator ',') as module_base_ids FROM mp_config_plan_page p left join mp_config_plan_menu m on p.menu_id = m.id left join mp_config_module d on p.module_id = d.id
p.logic_delete = 0
and p.menu_id = #{menuId}
group by p.sort_module
